title: southern star endemol
content:
I know this one shouldn’t be hard - perhaps I’ve had too much of a good weekend!!!

author: x8x8x

comments.content: Actually, I believe that’s the bold weight of [Meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112102927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11025.5.21&attributes.sampleSize=24&sampleText=endemol+southern+star&sampleSize=24), one of Erik Spiekermann’s other creations.
Thanks heaps... and it’s of to the font shop I go.. hi ho... hi ho...
